website_summaries.verdict: Buyers like this glove for its look, price, and feel, but getting the size right might be tricky.
pros: Perforations on various areas of the glove help reduce moisture
Soft leather works well and feels comfortable
cons: Fit is a little inconsistent with this glove
Some reports of ripping, peeling, and other quality issues

customer_reviews.title: Quality glove, mostly
customer_reviews.text: As an avid golfer, this is a good cost effective solution to tour gloves. The dawn patrol has similar feel to a tour glove but at half the price. My main issue with the two I have owned is Callaway's solution to typical velcro does not have the durability of velcro. Over a few rounds (in the heat of summer I alternate gloves each hole so I am using the latching more often than some) the top flap becomes "frayed" and no longer latches properly so now when I hit the ball there is a 50/50 the glove comes unlatched. I think this is a problem with all Callaway gloves of this generation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Club does not fly out of my hand and injure friends.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: For the price I believe these are the best golf gloves on the market
customer_reviews.text: For the price I believe these are the best golf gloves on the market. I've been using Sta-Soft and Weather-Soft for the last several years until i found these. Not only are these made from the same cabretta leather as the Sta-Softs, they are cheaper and fit better than Weather-Soft as well! Also, the durability of the glove is top notch. I bought 4 gloves and have been using a rotation of 3 for the last 2 months. Even when they are old and beat up, they remain soft, they fit well, and they have grip. I will continue to use this product until further notice.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality glove. I have had no issues whatsoever after many rounds at the driving range, practice in the back yard, and course. I read many complaints in previous reviews about holes or tears between the fingers. This is no defect. The gloves are designed to be that way for ventilation. I am very satisfied and will purchase these gloves again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove, Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: I stupidly ordered the glove without checking to see if "right" meant a glove for a right-handed person or a glove worn on the right hand. Unfortunately for me, it was the latter. When I went to go request a return, they issued me a refund without any hassle at all, and now I have a LEFT hand glove on the way. Excellent customer experience, and for what it's worth, the glove did feel very nice on my (wrong) hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Glove I've Ever Used-Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Dawn Patrol glove stays playable longer than any other glove I've tried in my 15 years of playing golf. I've made direct comparisons to cheaper and more expensive gloves and none outlasts the Dawn Patrol. I play in North Texas and May-Oct it's HOT. Even on the hottest day, DP stays usable, even when soaked with sweat. Most other gloves will stay usable for four or five holes in that weather and then they get wet and slippery, but I get away with using two gloves per round with the Dawn Patrol. It's just another thing I don't have to worry about during my round. Highly recommend these golf gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great durable golf glove!
customer_reviews.text: Had never used a Callaway glove before. Had alway used other brands I picked up wherever I happened to be. Those gloves lasted maybe 5 o 6 rounds before wearing out. This Callaway glove lasted nearly all season before showing signs of wear. So this is now my 3rd pair and 3rd Season using a Callaway glove.
customer_reviews.author: Akron Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Very comfortable. Fits as expected. I wouldn't hesitate to get another one next season if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove but picture didn't match the product
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove. Very comfortable. The size was true to the description but the actual glove did not match the picture. The actual glove had less black detail around the edges which is what I was hoping to get. Not that big of a deal and not worth sending back. Oh well, nice glove overall.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Typically get 5 games out of them and I am pretty rough on my glove
customer_reviews.text: Repeat customer, these gloves fit as expected and are high quality. Typically get 5 games out of them and I am pretty rough on my glove.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for a medium to large hand, if you got dem gorilla paws then go up a size
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: it fits for now and he’s happy with it and claims it helps his swing
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year-old loves this glove. Please note that the thumb on this glove fits small on his thumb while the fingers all had some wiggle room at the ends. Not sure if it’s because of his hand dimensions or the glove but something to think about. Regardless, it fits for now and he’s happy with it and claims it helps his swing :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Golfing Glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. The fit is a little on the large side. I've had other large gloves that were perfect but this one seems to be a little larger. I still give it 5 stars though as the quality seems to be there.
customer_reviews.author: 12TANG

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove, not as durable as others.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, well made. Comparing with Nike gloves, this feels much thinner/lighter. May be a better club feel, but less durable (shorter life) and ended up with a blister under the glove (index finger) after 100 range balls - haven't had this issue with other gloves.
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: ordered 2 but 1 is too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these in M/L for my hubby but only one of them fit-- the second one is going back as it is too small. This really amazes me since they are the same product, the same size and one is about a size smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the company when my order did not show up on time. Without hesitation they said that they would send out another order the same day. They also told me that if the original order showed up to keep it, no need to return it. The gloves showed up, they look great and feel great. I would not hesitate to order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: REID A CHOATE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove. It fits true to size and is very well made. I purchased this glove to replace one that had been used frequently for many years and was still in good shape, so I can attest to the longevity and quality of this product. It is as well-made as you would expect from a Callaway product at an extremely affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Shelleyd73

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, not as thin as some of the more expensive gloves out there but still have a nice feel to them. Have played 12 rounds with one of these gloves and they are holding up well. I would expect to get at least 30 rounds out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Max in Valrico

customer_reviews.title: Blew Out the Glove
customer_reviews.text: Played with it for 2 weeks during heavy golf play (3x a week hitting balls at the range & playing 18 holes) and it completely blew apart. I bought the Tour Glove that Callaway sells and it works much better. It's just a value problem, the glove was good but if you're going to play a lot, just spring the extra 5-8 bucks for a quality tour glove that won't bust apart from heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Real leather, long lasting and durable
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing a golf golve try to spend the extra money on real leather. They last so much longer. That is why I went with this golve. Soft smooth leather that forms with your hand, it provides amazing grip with the clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Olivasrebel

customer_reviews.title: It's a good golf glove that didn't fall apart after the first ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good golf glove that didn't fall apart after the first 18 or cost me an arm or a leg. When I need another, I'll be looking here first.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Smoothness
customer_reviews.text: super soft full cabretta leather glove; although the hybrid leather/nylon gloves are good also, nothing beats the soft cabretta for transferring feel and grip pressure. delivered on time and for a good price
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove from Amazon, have been using it for over a month, and it’s a good fit and is comfortable. I recommend it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: One glove was marked correctly but way too small
customer_reviews.text: Glove is good, but I ordered 3 pair. First one great. I discovered the second one was the wrong size, although the size in the packaging was correct. Too late to return. Now I have a glove that is way too small
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Another Couple For Upcoming Summer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf glove that provides maximum grip! This lasted me one summer and it is now thoroughly worn out, but I will be happy to buy another one for the upcoming summer. Callaway makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Not a cadet size
customer_reviews.text: I have another Callaway XL cadet size glove and that fits me perfectly. However, this XL cadet glove fingers are too long. Also hard to make a fist - the leather is too tight on the back of the hand. The only positive is a breathable palm
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glove last me a year before needing to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think this is fair. I play 18 holes usually every two weeks with some driving range action in between. So I use this glove.
customer_reviews.author: DanielD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glove, great price too.
customer_reviews.text: The glove fit perfectly, I have a big hand with long fingers. The Large non-cadet size was the perfect fit. In between the fingers are holes that allow breathing so that your hand does not sweat, and you can feel the smooth leather on your hand. So far has been 3 weeks of use and no wearing or tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Limo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf glove at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few of these gloves from Amazon.com and they are really good and at a very fair price. I intend to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: WestM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fits
customer_reviews.text: Works great. When new, will pill and leave your hand with some weird gunky residues. Not the most comfortable material but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove.
customer_reviews.text: Grips very well during normal play. Not so great in the rain but most gloves don't. My only complaint is that I feel like they could last a little longer but I will continue to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: gmredline

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this glove and have no complaints. Not sure what others dislike, but it does the job it's designed for well!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable glove. Good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality glove. it is very comfortable and lasts long enough. Still doesn't stack up to some other gloves for comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like A Glove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, and feels great while golfing. Only disappointment was my score at the end of my round.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hess

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality glove at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this golf glove for a few weeks and it is exactly what I expected. It fits great and feels good while playing. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: NRN

customer_reviews.title: nicely made, little holes in between fingers that could ...
customer_reviews.text: nicely made, little holes in between fingers that could of been sewn? or are these part of the ventilation? Either way I think it plays well. little slop on top but I think it could be akin to this particular glove.
customer_reviews.author: JohneeCarlos

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the 365 callaway glove to this one. Amazing glove, soft leather and very breathable. I usually wear a M/L, but this was a little big. Comfortable enough that I can live with it. Would switch to Medium next time.
customer_reviews.author: tywat

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: This golf glove only lasted a few month before developing a hole in the palm. It was a very comfortable fit, but did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: good glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit chart worked like a charm got better fitting ones then last time I bought from a b&m. These never last but that's expected with thin leather. Will more than likely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edward J.

customer_reviews.title: Callaway Dawn Patrol golf glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove for the price. It fits well and held up very well under most conditions, lasting for quite a few rounds. I would recommend this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Les Takayama

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: If you have big hands, then be sure to size up one more as the one I purchased was a bit tight on my hand. After a few wear and stretches, it started to fit better. Great material and strong grip if you enjoy a game of golf.
customer_reviews.author: English teacher chic

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I still have a slice, other than that, this glove is great. In fact, I haven't even accidentally let got of any clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. Haven't used it yet but can't see it being bad at all. UPDATE So apparently inside of the glove is made cheaply.... Some white particle comes off the glove and stays on my hand and part of my sleeve....
customer_reviews.author: John HK Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove. Looks professional and feels great. I have a large hand and it fit snug, but works well.
customer_reviews.author: William H Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Good golf glove!
customer_reviews.text: Callaway makes good golf equipment and this was well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: I bought a men's medium and the fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and was going to buy the woman's glove until I read the reviews. I also have large hands for a woman. I bought a men's medium and the fit like a glove. Pun intended. They feel great, helps me grip the golf club with ease. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: The glove is the current generation not the prior generation as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The current generation glove is not as durable as the prior generation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ho

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Good price and it looks sharp however it didn’t even hold up one season, and I only play at the most twice a week
customer_reviews.author: nicole maciura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but not very durable. Started to fall apart after about five uses.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but just as good as others that are more expensive. Gets be job done. A must have for golfers
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality golf glove.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift. They are good for most golfers.
customer_reviews.author: william carter

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a winner..... Very soft and great grip for the price point and demographic they are targeting.... I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Starting to lose its grip.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for first five uses but it’s starting to lose its grip already.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Felt rough, doesn’t fit true to size, wore 3 times and instead at now using my $8 generic one I got at a driving range. 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: M.J1221

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable glove, and it seems to last
customer_reviews.text: Once I found my size in a glove I really liked, I bought a bunch as this is the most comfortable glove I've tried and it fits great! When you can find a 2 pack, that is the best value
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Was too big for my hand and tore a hole after 3 visits to driving range.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to golf and bought these ones based on great reviews. I have to say I am very happy with the purchase! Provides a great grip, I have been going to the range frequently and these are holding up very strong!
customer_reviews.author: asimraza786

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Glove (Blister Alert)
customer_reviews.text: There is a large seam between the thumb material and the rest of the glove in the palm area that has caused a blister. I golf a lot and have worn through a lot of gloves this summer, but this one is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Best golf glove for the value
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite golf glove. Disclaimer: I'm a softball player so of course I am horrible at golf. But the glove definitely protects my hand and prevents blisters. It was packaged well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen R.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was different than what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: The glove pictured is not the glove that arrived. It's still a white Callaway though so not all bad.
customer_reviews.author: HiddenName

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits fairly well, would buy again. However, I am a golf novice, so I do not have high expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought large size and it’s too big .Sizes run bigger than other gloves I used. No thumb or palm padding. Very thin leather, would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steely

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick leather
customer_reviews.text: I'll buy these again, like the nice thick real leather. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: critics' choice

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable golf glove that I have used regularly for a long while
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 gloves in early December, played 15+ rounds and 10+ practice sessions still in great shape, durability is excellent. Previously bought under armour and Nike glove both ripped before 4 months of use. I do wash gloves with soap sometimes and try to take care of them, great product for value definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improper Fit!
customer_reviews.text: The actual fit was way too big! I have been using ML for three years and they always fit perfectly. This is the first time I bought them on line. I usually get them from Golfers Warehouse. The tag says ML but these are more like large/XL. The palms are also bunchy, not tight like they should be. I won't be ordering them from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 8 rounds and it dried out and has poor grip
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Classic value glove. Very comfortable with my large hands. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good glove. Comfortable. We'll see if it outlasts my other golf gloves.
customer_reviews.author: William Neil Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great glove must buy for the xxl hands out there.
customer_reviews.text: Can never find a glove that fits as I have a big hand, however these fit great in the xxl.
customer_reviews.author: roberto arreola

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT SIZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a medium size glove the first time and it was just about perfect. Bought the same glove, same size again and it just doesn't feel or fit the same! Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Mike bruss

customer_reviews.title: Cheap copy
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap knock offs and not original Callaway gloves. Seams separate and are not sewn together like originals.
customer_reviews.author: KDJ

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect. I ordered a large
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. I ordered a large, from base to top of middle finger, my hands are approximately 7.5 inches, and may be a tad thicker than average hands. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Sileo

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about a month now and is holding up better than other leather golf gloves I had used. Finger stitching is flat-seamed and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Gatto

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use it for golf
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for shooting my pistol at the gun range and does exactly what I intended it for, fits well and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, I followed the guide in the store and ordered off here.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a leather golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Callaway Men's Dawn Patrol Golf Glove - delivered promptly and was exactly what I ordered!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: sweet gloves. make sure you get the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: sweet gloves . make sure you get the right size or else you will be leaving bad reviews due to your bad life choices.
customer_reviews.author: RiotBoyBee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Just as good if not better than my more expensive gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've played numerous rounds in the desert with this glove, really hot conditions and sweating and it has held up really well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Davey

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate price
customer_reviews.text: Came a little larger than I thought. Definitely not a long lasting item, but it's a great price
customer_reviews.author: Nick Seoane

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for a gift and he is very pleased with how well it is holding up to wear and tear. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli

customer_reviews.title: They changed it!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the size and style of the glove. First few I’ve had we’re amazing and soft. Then recent one was too large and a different quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a.
customer_reviews.text: Got a size L glove. Fits like a... glove! Very soft and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SirZed

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: It works good and does it's job, have used it maybe 10 times and still OK.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: This product is softer and more durable that Footjoy. It is also a fraction of the price. Love these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: John Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Fingers a little long
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually need a cadet cut for a medium glove but the fingers on these are about half an inch to long for me. Very soft leather. Will still use it as gloves don't last me more than a few rounds.
customer_reviews.author: djfos

customer_reviews.title: No durability.
customer_reviews.text: Initially fit perfectly, but rapidly stretched until it was a little loose. The wore completely through in less than two weeks. About that time, the Velcro stopped working and the glove came loose on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Costello

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: This glove fit perfectly and is holding up well. Most gloves would have been worn out in the palm.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R

customer_reviews.title: Love the glove
customer_reviews.text: Love the glove, but as others have mentioned these tend to run small. I've always worn large golf gloves, and while I could get the large on with a dry hand before a round, trying to take it off and put it back on for different shots was basically impossible. Reordered in XL and gave the large to my playing partner.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It's a glove that has enhanced my game no end ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a glove that has enhanced my game no end. I often wear it around the house to impress my friends and remind myself to keep grinding. Not only in golf, but in life.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cox

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove, fits well, did not stay white very long.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how technical a golf glove can be but it fits true to size and has good grip. Mine discolored after one trip to the range (blueish around the palm). This sort of thing does not bother me as long as it is functional but others may need a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great. It helped me from getting blisters and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Game changer! These gloves are great. It helped me from getting blisters and also helped with my grip on the clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far. Fits well, seems to be durable
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Feel Great.
customer_reviews.text: They are a great fit and feel. They are a little thin and may not last as long as some of the more expensive gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Poor durability. Gets very stiff after a couple of rounds. Tends to draw up in the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: William Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: No rips, handles sweat and maintains grip - all at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, feels great. Needs a size chart on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cameraman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Fits Perfect. Wears Well. Protects your hand from blisters.
customer_reviews.author: D. WILDS

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this glove. Lasted about five rounds of golf before coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schroeder

product_meta.title: Callaway Men's Dawn Patrol Golf Glove (Leather), Prior Generation
product_meta.description: Callaway's Ultimate In Performance, Durability And Value.
feature_bullets: All Leather Constructions: Great Feel, Fit & Durability
Perforations On Palm, Fingers And Thumb: Moisture Reduction & Increased Breathability
Opti Fit Adjustable Closure: Thin, Light & Secure Fit
Cotton Terry Cuff: Soft Feel & Moisture Absorption
